author: Paul Maxim
content:
Hmmm, looks all too familiar to me, especially this weekend in the northeastern U. S.  Your experience on the road is a bit too familiar as well.  Nothing "romantic" or "fun" about snow when you've been fighting with it for over half a century!  But just think - only about 80 more days until spring.......

I like the use of flash here - never thought of doing that.  Could be interesting when we get those really big, wet flakes.
